1.instruction:
Create a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) for a cross-cultural dating website that matches Americans with non-Americans. The platform should combine Tinder's dating functionality with LinkedIn's professional interface. Include detailed requirements for:

1. Overall site appearance: Clean, LinkedIn-like professional style while being identifiable as a dating site
2. Sign-up & profile creation with specific fields (American/Non-American status, nationality, gender, orientation, relationship goals, geography via zip code, payment wall at $40/month or $400/year)
3. Default matching logic (non-American straight men match with American straight women, with override options)
4. Front page with search/match interface and unique feed (local events, immigration news, user posts, sponsored content)
5. Profile pages with standard dating features plus mandatory "Cultural Journey" section
6. Chat interface with AI-assisted conversation starters
7. Events & community features for culturally-themed in-person events
8. Payment integration for premium subscription model
9. Technical requirements: modern frameworks (Next.js frontend, Node.js backend, PostgreSQL database), full responsiveness for desktop and mobile
10. Scalability considerations for future immigration/legal services and cultural content

Conduct market research on existing cross-cultural dating platforms and competitive analysis. Save the PRD as a file for the development team.

2.instruction:
Design a complete system architecture for the cross-cultural dating website based on the PRD from task 1. Create a comprehensive system design that includes:

1. Frontend architecture using Next.js with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
2. Backend API architecture using Node.js with Express
3. Database schema design using PostgreSQL for user profiles, matches, messages, events, payments
4. Authentication and authorization system
5. Matching algorithm architecture
6. Real-time messaging system design
7. Payment integration architecture (Stripe)
8. File upload system for profile images
9. AI integration for conversation starters
10. Event management system
11. Feed and content management system
12. Mobile responsiveness architecture
13. Scalability considerations for future features
14. Security and privacy considerations
15. Deployment and infrastructure design

Output the complete system design document with diagrams and technical specifications. Save as a file for the engineering team.

3.instruction:
Develop the complete cross-cultural dating website based on the PRD and system design from previous tasks. Implement all features using Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn-ui components. The website must include:

1. Landing page with professional LinkedIn-style design
2. Complete authentication system (sign-up, login, password reset)
3. Comprehensive profile creation with all specified fields (American/Non-American status, nationality, gender, orientation, relationship goals, zip code location, interests)
4. Payment wall integration with subscription plans ($40/month, $400/year)
5. Main dashboard with Tinder-like matching interface
6. Unique feed system (events, news, user posts, sponsored content)
7. Profile pages with image galleries, bio, preferences, and mandatory "Cultural Journey" section
8. Real-time messaging system with AI-assisted conversation starter suggestions
9. Events page for culturally-themed community events
10. Matching algorithm with default logic and override options
11. Search and discovery features
12. Settings and preferences management
13. Mobile-responsive design optimized for all devices
14. Backend API with PostgreSQL database integration
15. File upload system for profile images
16. Admin panel for content and event management

Use modern web development best practices, ensure full responsiveness, and implement proper security measures. The site should feel premium and professional while maintaining dating app functionality.
